alert.note: Alert for Mohave (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LasVegas (Southern Nevada, Southeastern California, Northwestern Arizona)
info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued August 12 at 3:30PM MST until August 12 at 4:30PM MST by NWS LasVegas
info.description: ...FLASH FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 430 PM MST THIS AFTERNOON FOR NORTH CENTRAL MOHAVE COUNTY... At 330 PM MST, Doppler radar indicated that thunderstorms producing heavy rain across the warned area have diminished. Between 1 and 1.5 inches of rain has fallen and runoff continues. Flash flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly. HAZARD...Life-threatening flash flooding. Thunderstorms producing flash flooding. SOURCE...Radar. IMPACT...Life-threatening flash flooding of low-water crossings, creeks, normally dry washes and roads. Some locations that will experience flash flooding include... mainly rural areas of North Central Mohave County This includes the following roads... Mount Trumbull Loop Road between mile markers 31 and 58. FLASH FLOOD...RADAR INDICATED FLASH FLOOD DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
